TopicTitle: To the Mun and back as many times as possible

Articles.Content:
Ok Go to the Mun and back as many times as possible without using mods the debug menu or mining!

 

Rules: Uh no mods, no debug menu and you must launch from the KSC launchpad touchdown on the Mun (anywhere) plant a Flag then go back to kerbin land anywhere plant a flag then repeat and until you're out of fuel!  -LightBender

New rule: NO DOCKING WITH OTHER CRAFT FOR FUEL TRANSFER! 

Edited January 5, 2018 by LightBender
I forget stuff
